contexts.context: “My name would have no <mark>meaning</mark> to you, but I'm Erer Darothil,” he said, raising...
...Telvanni's casual acceptance of murder and assassination of rivals as a <mark>means</mark> to advancement. Those reluctant to prove their worthiness by killing...
...a diverse variety, he was able to demonstrate all the <mark>means</mark> of silent assassination he had developed over the years.
